import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create authentication token"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/rest/api/v1/createauthtoken"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates an authentication token for the authenticated user. These are
specifically intended to be used with the [Web SDK](https://developers.glean.com/web).

Note: The tokens generated from this endpoint are **not** valid tokens
for use with the Client API (e.g. `/rest/api/v1/*`).


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["token","expirationTime"],"properties":{"token":{"type":"string","description":"An authentication token that can be passed to any endpoint via Bearer Authentication"},"expirationTime":{"description":"Unix timestamp for when this token expires (in seconds since epoch UTC).","type":"integer","format":"int64"}},"title":"CreateAuthTokenResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid Request"},"401":{"description":"Not Authorized"},"429":{"description":"Too Many Requests"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
